data.title: Princeton University
data.meta_description: Awarded annually to a Princeton senior man of high scholastic rank and outstanding qualities of sportsmanship and general proficiency in athletics. Presented...
data.text:
Awarded annually to a Princeton senior man of high scholastic rank and outstanding qualities of sportsmanship and general proficiency in athletics. Presented by Mrs. William W. Roper and the Class of 1902.

Matthew Kolodzik and Michael Sowers were the 2020 Roper Trophy honorees.

1936 – Hugh A. MacMillan Jr. ’36, basketball, football
